channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 15:29 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community repulsed. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 15:29 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community repulsed. Stay tuned for further reports. #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 15:29 Alarm lifted in Odesa region. Follow further messages.

item.title: 🟡 15:28 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community - Miriv Territorial Community - Pokrov Territorial Community - Chervonogrigoriv Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 15:28 Repulse of the alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. item.title: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of civilians – 0800339291
item.description: 🟠 14:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of civilians – 0800339291#Kupyanskyi_rayon This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 13:39 Threat of artillery shelling! Now the Pokrovska territorial community is under artillery shelling. Take cover!
item.description: 🔴 13:39 Threat of artillery shelling! Now the Pokrovska territorial community is under artillery shelling. Take cover! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
